meanings.definition: Have a persistent and irritating sensation on the skin that causes a desire to scratch.
meanings.sent1: After rolling in the grass, my skin itches so much that I can't stop scratching.
meanings.sent2: When a mosquito bites you, your skin itches and you want to scratch it.
meanings.sent3: The wool sweater made my skin itch and itch until I had to take it off.
meanings.sent4: The idea of exploring the unknown itches at the back of my mind, urging me to take a leap.
meanings.sent5: The sound of nails on a chalkboard itches my ears and makes me cringe.

meanings.definition: Feel a strong desire or urge for something.
meanings.sent1: As soon as I saw the delicious cake, I felt my taste buds itch for a bite.
meanings.sent2: When I see a new book by my favorite author, I immediately itch to read it.
meanings.sent3: The thought of a weekend getaway makes me itch with excitement for the adventure ahead.
meanings.sent4: The opportunity to learn a new skill itches at my curiosity, pushing me to enroll in the class.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked cookies always itches my craving for a sweet treat.
